title: Enova Illumination Shines a New Light on Surgery
text:
Enova Illumination Shines a New Light on Surgery Tune into Fox Business Network and Bloomberg International as sponsored programming on Sunday, September 27, 2015. See market by market listings below. September 22, 2015 11:20 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
LOS ANGELES--( BUSINESS WIRE )--MMP (USA) announces a Worldwide Business with kathy ireland exclusive interview with Enova Illumination , a company that has created LED surgical headlights to provide more safety during surgical procedures. 
During the segment, Kathy Ireland interviewed Roger Heegaard, President of Enova Illumination. 
Roger commented on the company and what inspired them to create the advanced surgical headlights. He stated, "The traditional headlight is what is called a fiberoptic headlight. It is a technology that has been around for about a half a century or longer and it has not evolved much at all. What we have done is we have taken this technology and we have turned them into new types of surgical headlights . The battery is clipped to the surgeonâ€™s belt. They are brighter than a car's headlight and they are adjustable. We have created the most intense, single LED headlight in the world." 
The Vice President of Programming of Worldwide Business with kathy ireland, JL Haber was quoted stating, "Surgery is scary for anyone but knowing that there are innovative tools that make it more successful and allow the surgeons to be more precise makes it a little bit less intimidating. These are powerful new tools that will change the way people feel about surgery." 
Tune in to see Enova Illumination on Fox Business Network as sponsored programming on Sunday, September 27, 2015 at 5:30pm ET and on Bloomberg International as sponsored programming at 8:30am CET and 10:30am CDT.
